concept.title: Using an HDFS User
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the destination to use an HDFS user to write data to HDFS. By default, Hadoop FS uses the user.

conbody.p: Hadoop FS destinationusing an HDFS user to write to HadoopThe user is the user who started the . Or, when using Kerberos, the user is the Kerberos principal. Make sure updates to this topic go into the origin version of this file.

To use an HDFS user, perform the following tasks:
On HDFS, configure the user as a proxy user and authorize the user to impersonate the HDFS user.
For more information, see the HDFS documentation.
In the Hadoop FS destination, enter the HDFS user name.
